settings.heading: Hyper’s Back to School Must-Haves With up to 60% Off

settings.text: School is about to resume, and Hyper is gearing up students with their ultimate Back to School tech essentials sale happening July 14 – August 15, 2024. With savings up to 60% off, students can power through classes, study sessions, group projects and creative pursuits without missing a beat. Hyper's innovative accessories are designed to keep devices charged, connected and protected wherever the school year takes them—from lecture halls to dorm rooms to editing bays and beyond.

settings.headingtext: Off Campus Special: HyperPack Pro, HyperJuice 245W Battery Pack, & 2M USB-C Cable
settings.subheading:
$69 Off (Was $429.97 - Now $359.99)

This power-packed bundle includes the HyperPack Pro backpack with Apple Find My support to never lose track of your gear again. It also comes with the HyperJuice 245W Battery Pack to keep laptops, phones and more charged on the go, plus a 2M USB-C cable. It's the all-in-one bundle to stay powered up from campus to home.

settings.heading: Form-fit Hub for your MacBook
settings.description:
$60 Off (Was $99.99 – Now $40)

The HyperDrive DUO 7-in-2 USB-C Hub for MacBook Pro and MacBook Air adds 7 ports, including 4K HDMI and Thunderbolt 3 USB-C PD. It offers 4K video, fast USB-C speeds, and dual USB-C ports. The aluminum design matches your MacBook. A best-seller on Kickstarter and Indiegogo, it features a magnetic strip for easy detachment and includes an extension cord for wider compatibility.

settings.heading: Use your Ultra-portable iPad like a Laptop
settings.description:
$20 Off (Was $99.99 – Now $79.99)

Turn your iPad into a mobile desktop studio with this 6-in-1 USB-C media hub. It adds essential ports and media keys to connect accessories and control music/videos seamlessly without disrupting your workflow.

settings.heading: Dual Extended Monitors for PC Laptops
settings.description:
50% Off (Was $139.99 – Now $69.99)

The HyperDrive Dual Monitor USB4 Mobile Dock is a slim, portable USB4 docking station that features integrated HDMI 2.1 and DisplayPort 1.4 for single 8K 30Hz display support on SST and MST devices, and is capable of dual 4K 60Hz display support on MST enabled devices.

settings.heading: Perfectly Portable Hub for all Laptops
settings.description:
50% Off (Was $99.99 – Now $50)

This universal docking station provides 9 vital ports for MacBooks, Chromebooks and PCs. It features 4K HDMI, gigabit ethernet, 60W charging and more—keeping you powered, connected and productive.

settings.heading: Keep your Gear Organized and your Laptop Protected
settings.description:
For 13”–14” MacBooks: 50% Off
(Was $44.99 – Now $22.49)
For 15”–16” MacBooks: 50% Off
(Was $49.99 – Now $24.99)

The HyperShield Stash & Go Sleeve is a slim, protective laptop sleeve with an interior organization panel to stash your additional tech accessories like cables, chargers, mice, and connectivity solutions. It’s compatible with any 13”–16” MacBook, features 360° laptop protection, as well as a water resistant and scratch resistant exterior.
